text: @robreiner We really can't wait until November. To many people will die if we do. Trump needs to be Removed so we can have a leader get us through this pandemic safely. @TheDemocrats @RepAdamSchiff @SpeakerPelosi @RepValDemings @GOP @MSNBC @CNN @CNBC @ABC #coronavirus #TrumpIsKillingUs https://t.co/ARErpgs7Fi
